title: Update alternate contact number in business configuration

requirements.text: Update the alternate phone number displayed in the app (in frontend/src/config/constants.ts) to 7981314611. Ensure this updated number appears wherever the alternate contact number is referenced in the UI (e.g., header, footer, contact info sections).
acceptanceCriteria: The alternate contact number in frontend/src/config/constants.ts is set to 7981314611.
All UI locations that display the alternate phone number now show 7981314611.
The primary/main phone number and WhatsApp link remain unchanged.

constraints: Do not change the primary phone number or WhatsApp link â€” only the alternate number should be updated.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ (immutable paths).
nonGoals: Adding new contact fields or UI sections.
Changing backend data models or logic.
Updating any other business configuration constants.
